text: mariyu ontelalo rendu (penti - potu) mariyu avulalo rendu (penti - potu)." Varini adugu: "Emi? Ayana nisedhincindi, rendu magavatina leka rendu adavatina? Leka a rendinti garbhalalo unnavatina? Allah i vidhanga ajnapincinapudu, miru saksuluga untira? Lekapote! Jnanam lekunda prajalanu pedamargam pattincataniki allah peruto abad'dhanni kalpince vyakti kante mincina durmargudevadu? Niscayanga, allah durmargulaku sanmargam cupadu
